text: Hi, I hope you are enjoying your day today. I have a question for you, do you enjoy helping children in need?
hello yes, I enjoy helping children
That is wonderful, me too. Have you heard of the charitable organization called Save the Children?
no, no, he heard about it before but it seems interesting and beneficial

Well let me tell you a little about the mission of Save the Children, it is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
that seems very well I congratulate you
Imagine if everyone in the US donated a small amount to this charity, it would make a huge difference in the lives of these children.
Of course, if we all contribute a grain of sand out of a large amount
Exactly. I don't have much money but even a small contribution makes me feel proud that I can help children.
Of course I do not have much money either, but I would like to contribute a small amount

That is wonderful, let me tell you what your donation would go towards. It goes toward their education, healthcare, emergency disaster relief, hunger, and something that is important to me, protection against abuse, neglect, violence and exploitation.
great that makes me feel better person
You can donate up to $2 from this tasks profit, how much are you willing to donate?
I would like to donate 1 dollar

awesome, at the end of this tasks it will ask you how much you would like to donate and you will write in the amount of 1 dollar. That 1 dollar is going to make a huge difference for those children, I am impressed with your generosity.
thank you very much to you
I am proud of you!
and I of you, bye
Thank you, have a great day
thank you also!
